summary:
Starker, higher resolution, colour corrected flames and explosions
Aim is to increase range of hue and luminosity creating richer visuals and more realism for all fire
[b]v2.2[/b] now released with noticeably higher definition in many flame types, new realistic candle flames, better fire spell FX, more modded files and improvements in c
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][color=#88ff00]Check out my new survival PVP project [/color][url=https://www.armyrust.com][color=#88ff00]ARMYRUST[/color][/url][/size]

No ENB or other post-processing used in screenshots or video. 1080p quality available and recommended[/b]
[youtube]vcRgNfY_Rz0[/youtube][font=verdana]
[heading]DESCRIPTION[/heading]
High definition, colour corrected flames and explosions
Aim is to increase range of hue and luminosity creating richer visuals and more realism for all fire
[b]v2.3[/b]: Noticeably higher definition in many flame types, new realistic candle flames, better fire spell FX, more modded files and improvements in colouration and quality

[size=4]Comparison shots: [url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/2692-3-1365200247.jpg]One[/url] [url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/2692-1-1365200245.jpg]Two[/url] [url=http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/2692-2-1365200246.jpg]Three[/url][/size]

[heading]UPDATE HISTORY[/heading]
Update 2.3 : Fixed minor bugs + finalised
Update 2.1 : Added new realistic candle flames and reworked some things with better source textures
Update 2.0 : Rehaul; very noticeably higher definition, more textures edited, more flames recoloured, more range of luminosity and hue, more smoothness, better quality. Now in BSA format for easy management
Update 1.1 : Embers 1.1 - Added Torch embers (see screenshot)
Update 1.0 : Embers. Makes coals darker but glow brighter (see forge screenshot) and look less seperate from the rest of the fire (see furnace screenshot). Changes are subtle.

[heading]INSTALLATION[/heading]
Unpack .rar contents to Data\

[heading]MY TOP MODS[/heading][b]

author: Ichibu
